   20: 
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(openssl_tls_1_3_version_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: 
   28: 
   29: %% Common test
   30: -export([all/0,
   31:          groups/0,
   32:          init_per_suite/1,
   33:          init_per_group/2,
   34:          end_per_suite/1,
   35:          end_per_group/2
   36:         ]).
   37: 
   38: %% Test cases
   39: -export([tls12_client_tls13_server/1
   40:         ]).
   41: 
   42: 
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: all() -> 
   47:     [
   48:      %%{group,  openssl_server},
   49:      {group,  openssl_client}
   50:     ].
   51: 
   52: groups() ->
   53:     [
   54:      %%{openssl_server, [{group, 'tlsv1.3'}]},
   55:      {openssl_client, [{group, 'tlsv1.3'}]},
   56:      {'tlsv1.3', [], cert_groups()},
   57:      {rsa, [], tests()},
   58:      {ecdsa, [], tests()}
   59:     ].
   60: 
   61: cert_groups() ->
   62:     [{group, rsa},
   63:      {group, ecdsa}].
   64: 
   65: tests() ->
   66:     [%%tls13_client_tls12_server, %% Not testable with current openssl s_client
   67:      %%tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server,
   68:      tls12_client_tls13_server].
   69:     
   70: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   71:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
   72:     case ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_version('tlsv1.3', Config) of
   73:         true ->
   74:             Config;
   75:         false ->
   76:             {skip, openssl_does_not_support_version}
   77:     end.
   78: 
   79: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   80:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
   81: 
   82: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
   83:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
   84:         true ->
   85:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config);
   86:         false ->
   87:             do_init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
   88:     end.
   89:   
   90: do_init_per_group(openssl_client, Config0) ->
   91:     Config = proplists:delete(server_type, proplists:delete(client_type, Config0)),
   92:     [{client_type, openssl}, {server_type, erlang} | Config];
   93: do_init_per_group(openssl_server, Config0) ->
   94:     Config = proplists:delete(server_type, proplists:delete(client_type, Config0)),
   95:     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, openssl} | Config];    
   96: do_init_per_group(rsa, Config0) ->
   97:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
   98:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
   99:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  100:     [{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  101:      lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  102: do_init_per_group(ecdsa, Config0) ->
  103:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  104:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso 
  105:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  106:         true ->
  107:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  108:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  109:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  110:             [{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  111:              lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  112:         false ->
  113:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  114:     end.
  115: 
  116: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  117:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  118: 
  119: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  120: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  121: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  122: 
  123: %% openssl s_client cannot be configured to support both TLS 1.3 and TLS 1.2.
  124: %% In its ClientHello the supported_versions extension contains only one element
  125: %% [{3,4}] that the server does not accept if it is configured to not support
  126: %% TLS 1.3.
  127: tls13_client_tls12_server() ->
  128:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  129: 
  130: tls13_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  132:                    ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  133:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,
  134:                    ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  135:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  136:     
  137: %% tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server() ->
  138: %%      [{doc,"Test basic connection between TLS 1.2 server and TLS 1.3 client when " 
  139: %%        "client has TLS 1.3 specsific extensions"}].
  140: 
  141: %% tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server(Config) ->
  142: %%     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  143: %%     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  144:   
  145: %%     {ServerOpts, ClientOpts} =
  146: %%         case proplists:get_value(client_type) of
  147: %%             erlang ->
  148: %%                 {[{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}|ServerOpts0],
  149: %%                  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  150: %%                   {signature_algs_cert, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
  151: %%                                          ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
  152: %%                                          rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  153: %%                                          rsa_pkcs1_sha256,
  154: %%                                          {sha256,rsa},{sha256,dsa}]}|ClientOpts0]};
  155: %%             openssl ->
  156:                 
  157:             
  158: %%     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  159: 
  160: 
  161: %% TODO: wrong version of TLS is configured for the client
  162: tls12_client_tls13_server() ->
  163:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  164: 
  165: tls12_client_tls13_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  166:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  167:                    ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  168:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,
  169:                    ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  170:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  171:
